page.title: 05IBM AT HURSLEY
page.content: Hursley House is circled by large buildings which include research and development offices for {IBM.(International Business Machines ) IBM was first started in America and came over to Britain in 1893. IBM employs 2,155 people. All the major employees have a telephone each. Disc files,display devices and tele-conferencing computers are developed here. On the domestic computers in the offices notes can be sent in a fraction of a second to other computers all over the world. Even drawings can be communicated. Tele-conferencing is a means by which two persons in diffrent parts of the world, can communicate using {television screens, computers and {microphones.
